content: ** snowman lip balm holder keychain -------------------------------- ** this snowman lip-balm holder keychain is a festive and practical accessory to give as gifts use for christmas decor or sell at craft fairs use as stocking stuffers gift toppers or add as a charm on your bag or backpack complete the polished look of your handmade lip balm holders with these lip balm holder display cards inserts 1 sold separately **materials needed** yarn in 4 colors - ricorumi dk 100% cotton 25 g 57 5 m white red black and optional green crochet hook size e 3 5 mm a darning needle stitch markers a pair of scissors metal spring hook or keyring **abbreviations** mc = magic_ring chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch sts = stitches fo = fasten_off french knot for the snowman s buttons you can watch this video tutorial by mikey from the crochet crowd below he explains how to make a french knot i wrapped my yarn around the needle 3 times as opposed to only twice for the snowman s buttons **skill level** beginner **gauge** 13 stitches and 11 row = 5 cm in single_crochet **size** this lip balm holder measures approx 3 7 9 5 cm in height to the top of the hat **yardage** weight 6 grams yardage approximately 14 m 15 3 yards **notes** - you can make the pattern larger or smaller by changing the type of yarn and/or hook size depending on the size of your lip balm lipstick or lip gloss you might want to add a few rounds of white to increase height - numbers at the end of each row in brackets indicate the number of final stitches in that row - please ensure that your lip balm is the size of the bottom of the holder after round 2 - insert your lip-balm lipstick or lip gloss into the holder when you get to almost the end to see if you need to add a few rounds to adjust height - we ll be working in the round so a stitch marker is advised - please note that i use us crochet terms **please note** this product is for a crochet pattern only this is not for a finished physical item nothing will be shipped to you by post you will download a digital file that you can save on your computer/tablet or cell phone no returns or refunds will be issued on instant downloads after pattern/s have been downloaded this pattern explains how i make this project it is not guaranteed that your finished project looks exactly the same this will depend on a number of reasons yarn and hook you use your crocheting skills style gauge etc this pattern or its parts may not be replicated altered shared or resold without permission you may sell physical items made from this pattern but please give credit to me as the designer see below rights are not transferrable if you have
